The germination of the seed represents the beginning of spiritual life, and the development of the plant is a figure of the development of character. There can be 
                                                                           106
no life without growth. The plant must either grow or die. As its growth is silent and imperceptible, but continuous, so is the growth of character. At every stage of development our life may be perfect; yet if God's purpose for us is fulfilled, there will be constant advancement.
